So I downloaded the app to show my support for my king and all of the sudden at 3 am I received 2 different calls at 3:48 am. I picked up the first call and heard heavy breathing. I could tell it was trump breathing because hey, I know how my king sounds like, and a distant slapping noise... I was so confused so I said â€œhello?â€ And all I could hear is Trump saying â€œoh yeah lemme break that small thing inside yaâ€ and then I hung up. I thought it was a prank call or maybe a mistake so I went back to sleep. Got another call, it was 4:02 am this time, I picked up. â€œHello?â€ I asked, despite being really tired, and I could only hear Trump saying.... and oh god those words he told me, I could never forget them....
